physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mild anxiety (1 on a 0- to 3-point scale), mild nausea, strong but not fast heartbeat.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms resolved within 8 hours after modafinil dosing on both days.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Moderate chest tightness, nausea, anxiety, and a pounding but not fast heartbeat.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms progressed in intensity compared to the earlier day.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Modafinil, 200 mg daily, was started and increased to 400 mg without incident.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient reported previous symptoms as 'the same but much more intense.'
